publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4164 Ross Finnie: Welcome Retention of Low Moss Prison Name—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Prison Service’s decision to retain the name of HMP Low Moss in East Dunbartonshire, noting the hard work of many members of the local community who have campaigned for the retention of this name.

S3M-4164 Ross Finnie: Welcome Retention of Low Moss Prison Name—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Prison Service’s decision to retain the name of HMP Low Moss in East Dunbartonshire, noting the hard work of many members of the local community who have campaigned for the retention of this name.
